welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Milwaukie, known for its rich history, beautiful parks, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Portland International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Portland International Airport serves domestic flights for Alaska Airlines, American Airlines, and Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Portland International Airport serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines and Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Portland International Airport serves domestic and international flights for JetBlue, Spirit Airlines, and Sun Country Airlines.

wifi.note: Complimentary Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
